    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Couches de sédiments</string>
            <string language="en">Layers of sediments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schichten Sedimente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Camadas de sedimentos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strati dei sedimenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στρώματα των ιζημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capas de sedimentos</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre les couches de particules formées lors du dépôt du mélange d'eau et de sable.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the layers of particles formed upon settling of the mixture of water and sand.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">argile</string>
            <string language="en">clay</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">gravier</string>
            <string language="en">gravel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">taille particulaire</string>
            <string language="en">particle size</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sable</string>
            <string language="en">sand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Schichten der Partikel,
die nach dem Vereinbaren der Mischung des Wassers und des Sandes 
gebildet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as camadas de 
partículas dadas forma em cima de estabelecir-se da mistura da água 
e da areia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli strati delle 
particelle formate sulla sedimentazione della miscela di acqua e della
sabbia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τα στρώματα των μορίων 
που διαμορφώνονται επάνω στην τακτοποίηση του μίγματος ύδατος και
άμμου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las capas de 
partículas formadas sobre colocar de la mezcla del agua y de la 
arena.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
